selectStatements.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
OV.PARTY_ID AS ACCNT_PARTY_ID,
'Y' AS SECURITY_ENABLE_FLG
FROM
DW_CXS_SALES_ACCOUNT_ACCESS_D OV ,
(SELECT ACR.RESOURCE_ID AS RESOURCE_ID, ACR.TYPE_CODE AS TYPE_CODE, ACH.GROUP_ID AS GROUP_ID
FROM
DW_CXS_GROUP_RESOURCES_D ACR,
DW_CXS_ACCESS_GROUP_RF_DN_DH ACH
WHERE ACR.GROUP_ID = ACH.PARENT_GROUP_ID AND ACR.TYPE_CODE=ACH.TYPE_CODE) ORR
WHERE
ORR.GROUP_ID       = OV.GROUP_ID
AND ORR.TYPE_CODE           =OV.TYPE_CODE
AND ORR.RESOURCE_ID     = VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.USER_PARTY_ID)
